name: Suunto 7 Watch - Unisex
description: With more than 70 activity profiles and Google’s powerful Wear™ OS, this GPS smartwatch is ready to hit the ground running. An internal GPS and optical heart rate monitor let you take your training to the next level. Pair it with your phone to get calls, texts and reminders sent right to your watch. Your Suunto 7 can access your Google account for calendar updates, email, Google assistant, Google Maps and more. Use the free Suunto smartphone app to connect with other fitness platforms to share activities, plan routes or use heatmaps to find popular runs, rides, trails, or swims wherever Suunto users play. You can also download free offline outdoor maps directly to your 7. Or download music and podcasts from your Google Play account, synch your Bluetooth™ headphones to your 7 and hit play, no phone needed. Activity tracking outside of training sessions is handled by Google Fit™. Track your activity levels and receive coaching to help guide you towards a happier and healthier lifestyle.70 different sport modes and metrics (running, swimming, cycling, etc).Equipped with an optical heart rate monitor to train without a chest strap.Powered by Wear OS by Google, pairs with Gmail™, Google Maps, Google Play™ Music, Google assistant and more.Stream music or video audio (Google Play, Spotify, Pandora, YouTube and more) through a smartphone and control it right on your watch. Or, download playlists and podcasts via your Google Play Music account and enjoy your tunes phone-free. Holds 1000s of songs (depending on quality).Use Google Pay™ contact-less payment with your watch (if supported by your bank).Free offline maps let you synch and store maps. Select maps, and the 7 automatically downloads a 40-50km range when charging and connected to Wi-Fi.Heatmaps for 15 activities display popular routes.Breadcrumb style navigation tracks your route, you can overlay the track in a variety of map apps.Connects to GPS and GLONASS and Galileo or Beidou satellite constellations for fast, strong signals nearly anywhere.FusedSpeed™ combines GPS and accelerometer data to provide a very stable running pace.Google Fit tracks steps, calories, Heart Points and Move Minutes, developed with the World Health Organization (WHO) to show the impact on health and overall mental well being.Wi-Fi functionality.Connect your wireless speakers and headphones with Bluetooth.Bluetooth 5.0 offers increased range and improved power efficiency.Free Suunto app lets you connect and sync training apps, like Strava™ and TrainingPeaks™.Included Suunto Value Pack gives you premium access to popular apps, including: 60-day Strava Summit trial, 30-day Training Peaks premium membership, 3-months of Relive club, and a 90-day SportTracks membership.Google Play store gives you access to Google’s app library, to change your watch face, add dynamic weather, 5000+ different apps.Up to 12 hours in GPS tracking mode and up to 48 hours in smartwatch mode. Note: the more your Suunto 7 is doing for you, the shorter the battery life will be.Automatic software updates (over Wi-Fi) keep your watch up to date.Smart notifications (emails, texts, alerts and more) come in via Bluetooth connection to your phone.8GB internal memory, with 4.5GB of useable space leaves lots of room for apps, maps and more.Touchscreen and buttons work in any weather, with or without gloves.Bright, clear AMOLED touchscreen.Tough, non-reflective Gorilla Glass© crystal.In the box: Suunto 7, USB cable, quick guide, documentation and a Suunto sticker.
